data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Larsen, Kim, Shimomura, Michitaka (2008): Tanaidacea (Crustacea: Peracarida) from Japan. IV. Shallow-water species from Akajima with notes on the recolonization potential of tanaids. Zootaxa 1678: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274064
